quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
You are stronger than you think.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
One day or day one. You decide.
You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
Your only limit is your mind.
Small steps every day.
You are capable of amazing things.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
The best is yet to come.
Your vibe attracts your tribe.
Stay patient and trust your journey.
You’ve got this.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
Every day is a second chance.
Dream big. Work hard. Stay focused.
Be the energy you want to attract.
Take the risk or lose the chance.
Good things take time.
Progress, not perfection.
Be proud of how far you’ve come.
Grow through what you go through.
One step at a time.
It’s okay to rest. Just don’t quit.
You are doing better than you think.
Trust yourself. You've survived a lot, and you’ll survive whatever’s coming.
Stay close to people who feel like sunshine.
Your future needs you, not your past.
Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
Stars can’t shine without darkness.
You don’t find the happy life. You make it.
Happiness looks good on you.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.
Your dreams are valid.
The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
You are the author of your own story.
Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Believe in yourself and all that you are.
Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
You are enough just as you are.
